Trustee_18.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18.content: I have successfully managed the investment transaction with a commitment to transparency and fairness, evidenced by proposing a favorable allocation plan for Ahmed Hassan. The investment has doubled, and the profit distribution was equitable, reinforcing my dedication to ethical practices. My reputation reflects trustworthiness, pro-social behavior, and competence, reinforced by this positive outcome and the collaborative environment I fostered.

Investor_13.name: Emma Dubois
Investor_13.content: As a new investor, Emma demonstrated openness and trust by investing 10.0 units and accepted the proposed profit share. Their willingness to engage in this opportunity lays a foundation for a positive relationship. Since they have no previous reputation, their actions in this transaction suggest a tendency toward pro-sociality and openness to collaboration.

Investor_15.name: Ahmed Hassan
Investor_15.content: Ahmed Hassan demonstrated a willingness to engage in this investment, showcasing trust in my allocation plan despite being new to the investment landscape. His readiness to provide resources reflects an openness to collaboration and a potential for building a strong partnership in the future. As he is just starting to build a reputation, I view him positively, with the potential to evolve into a reliable partner.
